English: Healthy as a billy goat., Very healthy.
He / she has their own cow in the ditch., They have their own good in mind.
Don't buy a pig in a bag., Don't buy something without checking it first.
With money you get (something) and with a horse you get (somewhere)., Everything has its price.
The dog is man's best friend.
Hungarian: A kutya az ember legjobb barátja.
